body_html: Thanks @tfboyd. There was already similar HTML embedded into the MD of that page (well, except the br's), so we figured it was okay. If you'd like to reformat to be a bit more pure on the MD, that's understandable. Let us know if we can help.

body: Thanks @tfboyd.  There was already similar HTML embedded into the MD of that page (well, except the br's), so we figured it was okay.  If you'd like to reformat to be a bit more pure on the MD, that's understandable.  Let us know if we can help.
